atk-vin02a13:1: 655. Adhikaraṇasamathesu – sattāti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhyāparicchedo. Catubbidhaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samenti vūpasamentīti adhikaraṇasamathā. Tesaṃ vitthāro khandhake ca parivāre ca vutto, tassatthaṃ tattheva vaṇṇayissāma. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a13:6: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, kāle vassaṃ ciraṃ pajaṃ;
atk-vin02a13:7: Tappetu devo dhammena, rājā rakkhatu medaninti.
